topic.title: Frequently used DOS line-command utilites integrated into UI

body.p: This function is part 1 of 2, and the final implementation is done in the next version of .
Important line command utilities such as OtmExp2TMX or OtmMtEval etc. are now integrated into , and can be directly envoked from within .
This frees users from remembering long and complex command line syntnax calls. The function is called via "Utilities" --> "GUI for command line tools" inside the workbench.
